doc.field: 004. New York Tribune Police Bureau opposite Police Headquarters in Mulberry Street, 1879 when two Tribune reporters waited for news to break. Jacob Riis in corner, his partner, Amos Einsign seated at desk. The other man may be the detective from across the street who is at the right hand side in the foundling picture. (negative 32303)

004. New York Tribune Police Bureau opposite Police Headquarters in Mulberry Street, 1879 when two Tribune reporters waited for news to break. Jacob Riis in corner, his partner, Amos Einsign seated at desk. The other man may be the detective from across the street who is at the right hand side in the foundling picture. (negative 32303)
